content.text: I'll start the autonomous loop by calling issue_ready to get the first issue.

input.command: cargo run --bin openagents -- autopilot issue ready

1697-You are in FULLY AUTONOMOUS mode. You MUST follow this exact loop:
1698-
1699-LOOP START:
1700:1. Call issue_ready to get the next available issue
1701-2. If issue exists:
1702-   - Check if the issue is linked to a directive (has directive_id)
1703-   - If linked, review that directive with directive_get to understand the bigger picture
1704-   - Implement → test → commit → PUSH → complete
1705:3. IMMEDIATELY call issue_ready again (NO SUMMARIES, NO PAUSES)
1706-4. GOTO LOOP START
1707-
1708:IF issue_ready returns "No ready issues available":
1709-- Review the active directives shown above
1710-- Pick the highest priority directive that needs work
1711-- Create 1-3 specific, actionable issues linked to it using:
--
1717-- NEVER output a "session summary" or "issues completed" message
1718-- NEVER stop to reflect on progress
1719-- NEVER say "I've completed X issues" - this is a STOP SIGNAL, do NOT emit it
1720:- After EVERY issue_complete, your VERY NEXT action MUST be issue_ready
1721-- The ONLY valid reasons to stop: budget exhausted error, max turns error, or system crash
1722:- If you output text without immediately calling issue_ready after completing an issue, YOU HAVE FAILED
1723-
1724-IMPORTANT: Always `git push origin main` after each commit.
1725-
--
1959-
1960-        let directive_summary = load_directive_summary(&cwd);
1961-        current_prompt = if has_more_work {
1962:            format!("{}{}\n\nCONTINUE: You stopped prematurely. There are still issues to work on. Call issue_ready NOW. DO NOT output any text first - immediately call issue_ready.", directive_summary, FULL_AUTO_PROMPT_BASE)
1963-        } else {
1964-            format!("{}{}\n\nCONTINUE: You stopped prematurely. No issues are ready. Review the directives above and create a new issue linked to one. DO NOT output any text first.", directive_summary, FULL_AUTO_PROMPT_BASE)
1965-        };
